thread.title: Ground News - Flood situation continues to improve in Johor, Pahang and Kelantan, says Nadma
thread.title_full: Ground News - Flood situation continues to improve in Johor, Pahang and Kelantan, says Nadma

author: The Star Kuala Lumpur
title: Ground News - Flood situation continues to improve in Johor, Pahang and Kelantan, says Nadma
text:
Summary by The Star Kuala Lumpur KUALA LUMPUR: The flood situation in three states - Pahang, Kelantan and Johor - showed significant improvement as at 8pm on Monday (Jan 1), resulting in the number of flood victims dropping drastically as only 85 flood victims are remaining at four Temporary Flood Relief centres (PPS) compared with 114 at five PPS in the afternoon. Read full story Share menu More
